intervals.description: Replace engine oil and oil filter. Use 10W-40 JASO MA or MA2 rated oil.
Check and adjust intake and exhaust valve clearances.
Drain and replace engine coolant with Yamaha-approved coolant.
Replace spark plugs. Use NGK LMAR8A-9 or equivalent.
Replace air filter element. Clean more frequently in dusty environments.
Check and adjust drive chain slack (20-30mm free play). Clean and lubricate.
Replace front and rear brake fluid. Use DOT 4 brake fluid.
Inspect front and rear brake pad wear. Minimum pad thickness: 1mm.
Synchronize throttle bodies using vacuum gauges.
Replace front fork oil. Inspect fork seals for leaks.
